article_title: The Next Obamacare Enrollment Crisis For The Uninsured Arrives On April Fool's Day

article_metadata.description: The Affordable Care Act prohibits people from buying Obamacare-approved health insurance after March 31, which means millions of uninsured Americans are in for a shock come April Fool's Day.
article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews
